description: There seems to be a pro-edition (most likely for money) which allows drag and drop to create generalizations and associations between classes. However, in this version you have to right click and select an option in a context menu twice to create a link. This is impractical. You can create diagrams faster in Inkscape.

> "The only UML tool that recognises Python instance attributes"
... if you pay for the PRO version!

> Linux compatible
Link to Latest release (1.84) is for ubuntu 20.04, in 2022 (so ubuntu was 23.04 already).
The snap version is 0.98.
Why is it on the snap store?
summary: pay to use, not really linux

description: obliger de payer la version pro pour enregistrer
导入python代码后，可以协助python程序员迅速理解框架设计。绝对值得推荐。
